description.lang: The wireless Leviton DZ15S is a Z-Wave enabled switch designed for use for most residential lighting applications to control LED, CFL, and incandescent bulbs. The DZ15S Switch is fully compatible with Z-Wave Plus certified controllers.Manufacturer Parameters allow custom configuration via Z-Wave commands. Offers manual control to turn lights on/off.Facilitates single pole or three-way multi-location applications.Rated for 600W LED and CFL bulbs, 1800W incandescent bulbs, 15A Fluorescent (at 120 VAC) and 8A (at 277 VAC), 15A Resistive, and 1/2 HP Motor.Requires neutral connection.These Z-Wave Plus devices support beaming, network wide inclusion, and over the air updates.White and Light Almond color faces included, Decora wallplate sold separately.
